queries.q: Which position does the codename "Jonior Shifu" belong to?
Which position does the codename "Swift Blade" belong to?
Which position does the codename "Truth Seeker" belong to?
Which position does the codename "Red Mercury" belong to?
Which position does the codename "Deadly Nightshade" belong to?
Assuming the game starts on day 1, which is not right? (n=0, 1, 2, 3...)
options: New Clan Chief will be determined at 0:00 on day 3+4n
New Guild Master will be determined at 0:00 on day 6+8n
New District Rep will be determined at 0:00 on day 9+16n
New City Mayor will be determined at 0:00 on day 17+32n
New World Elders will be determined at 0:00 on day 33+32n
